documents.document:
my heart bleeds

there a several types of love
family love......ive experienced ups and downs in this department and the only love in this catergory that although it has gone up and down is my lil brother
parental love......dont even need to think of this one is my mother the one person who has been there no matter what has always been there in the toughest times and saved me from hazordous dangers
Now comes the tricky bit
Puppy love.....lets start from the begining shall we...puppy love is the most childish of this spectrum of emotion and usually happens at the start of puberty i would have to say im unsure of it im geussing it would have to be a boy in primary school his name was Robin.
Infatuation.....often confused with sexual attraction as they often work hand in hand. this is also called love at first sight as ive often stated about Romeo and Juliet if they loved each other they wouldnt have wanted pain for the other and would have ran away at the very start its when u meet someone and instantly want them and then the feeling fades within a day or two.....and im geussing the only person i know ive been infatuated with is a man called Tom Scott..
Sexual Attaction......are yes the one that comes to us all no matter who we are.....and we can have it about a vast number of people. it is an emotion purely based on sex hence the name and if you meet someone who says they love you and then they want you in their bed with in days.....its just hormones they dont love you they just want sex this one working in hand with infatuation is often mistaken for love but one will always follow the other and they will never happen together and dont think i have ever been infatuated with anyone and just wanted to fuck them.....i geuss im sad like that having only slept with two people one being someone who was more like a best friend and it just happened and finally the big one the daddy of the big five just like everthing in life....five sense five fingers five toes and well thats all the fives i can think of but let me get back to the point the last one is love........this is the one where all those feelings fall together this is true love and yes i must say i am in love but with who cannot be stipulated........sit down and think about what ive written everyone and see if youve had any of the above
Peace

You know what i hate

you know what i hate people who try to control other peoples lives by saying what they can and cant do...or parents who mollycoddle their children who are like 17,18 etc....they are kiddies any more let them grow up jesus.....
and that ladies and gentlemen is what i hate

get the point

this world is full of so much pain and torture that the youth of today and i must admit i am a youth of today but i dont think like one. the youth of today are so self absorbed pity me creatures who think that successfull relationships are ones that last longer than a week or two. i mean what planet are these people from i hear you say well no one is quite sure but it is an almost certain fact that they are human.
Whatever happened to the time when relationships meant something when people fell in love with people because of who they were not just for a quick fumble tumble. i mean come on get with the programme i feel like im one of the few people out there who actually go into a relationship because they have thought about it and actually feel something for the other person..
how many women and men out there have fallen for someone hook line and sinker only to have them back out during a time of need....it just goes to prove that the people of today are not just born with silver spoons in their mouths but most of them have argos home section in their too

sat at home

im sat at home as i cant go to college.
i never thought id be sad to have three weeks off but i am as its for a bad reason.
anyway im a fighter and im sure ill find some way of seeing my mates and a certain special guy i just need to find comething to occupy myself if anyone has any sugestions on how best to use my time as college have restrained me from the premises until december......i miss college....i miss my friends......i miss working...tahts right i miss working....... any sugestions on how to use my time please tell me love u all
ha ha ninja face lol big hair ha ha ha

confused

im so totally confused
i mean people have said many things to me over the past few weeks some people hate me some people say they love me and i just dont understand.
im one of those bohemian rebels who follows their heart but i feel like the map im reading is written for someone else......i dont know how a certain someone feels about me and its completely confusing me to the point where i cant think straight...i mean what gives
a simple answer people..u either feel somthing or not

Im hollow

these past few weeks a certain someone has drained me completely making me feel like dirt beyond dirt and i just cant comprehend it at all why have they done this and why is the pain to deep to bare anymore

sat alone

im sat here trying to understand the meaning of this month.......so much shit has happened and i feel totally drained...ive given up being nice to people as this has just got me stabbed in the back and people lying about me.....theres this guy who i have feelings for and ive had to bury the feeling as it seems they see me as a liar who went out with them to hurt them...however this is not me...as a young girl boys often went out with me and beat me up when no one was looking so i know what its like....i never lie about love it is the most important subject in my life...im a bohemian you see a hopless romantic and thats about it....
one day..you know who you are....you will see that i loved you and always told you the truth

Fear

its funny isnt it how small things can strike fear into people....for example....i got threatening phone calls from someone and now im afraid to leave my house.......answer my phone......or even look people in the eye.....i just dont know who to trust or who is telling the truth
its like a spounge it just soaks up everything and by the end of it your frightened of your own shadow...constantly looking over your shoulder and forever wondering why....grrr

im confused

i dont get it....me and my ex are mates again which is great but i dont understand why he keeps trying it on with me in the sense that he always wants me to sit on his lap or give him a hug and when i do i have to stand five feet away for an obvious reason....explain to me please someone why he keeps trying to hug me and kiss me.....i dont get it..

SMILE

when things get you down
and your in a deep hole
just remember im with you
just look in your soul

to jack

my life is great..im going to uni in sept i have new friends and im finally getting my life sorted so fuck u jack ha ha ha ha

i have bi polar but im happy

need i say more......god bless people with hearts..there aren't many of you..most people in the world are assholes.......alot of the people i used to know who went to and still go to stratford college.....u know who u are...can kiss my ridges.....i rock..you suck........my life is great ha ha ha ha ha
you know what Bi Polar is easy to live with if you have a soul like me

God is a pooper

I hate blogs
Lifes a load of bollocks made by some ultra being probably male knowing life that shits on you from a great height at birth and then you spend the rest of your life cleaning it off
